title: Google's Samy Bengio is leaving amid fallout from AI researcher firing
snippet: At least a few employees have resigned, citing the company's handling of Gebru's research and departure. Though Bengio didn't mention Gebru specifically in his departure email Tuesday, he gave kudos to his team for improving their "understanding of machine learning and its impact on the world."
